thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Scented tea is made by adding fragrant flowers to high-quality green tea.
sentences.chinese: 香片是由高级绿茶加香花制成的。

sentences.english: Phila of cachous, kissing comfits, in her satchel.
sentences.chinese: 她的手提包里装著口香片，接吻时吃的糖果。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To establish an HPLC method to determine hesperidin contents in Chensuxiang tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立陈苏香片中橙皮苷的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The products are sold as dissolvable, flavored tablets.
sentences.chinese: 该产品还以可溶解的加香片形式销售。

sentences.english: The Jasmine Tea is complimentary, sir.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉香片是免费的，先生。

sentences.english: We can make any air fresheners and printed matters according to your needs.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以根据您的需要定做任何香片或纸制印刷品。
